author: Anonymous Helix
title: Can I use a laptop charge to charge my laptop while writing the exam?
question: Question in title
student_answer: "Please bring your own computer to the exam and ensure that it has sufficient power to complete the exam. While we recommend bringing a charger as backup, we do not guarantee a spot with an outlet for anyone." - from @600
instructor_answer: Please read the midterm instructions linked in @600 carefully.
